channel.title: Need help with making my server public!
channel.description: Hey guys atm i'm trying to make my server public so one of my friends can log in to it while i'm coding it. So far i've port forwarded it but now i dont know what to do i haven't changed anything to do with ip or anything in my client or server files so i need to know what to change in them and i also need to know if i need anything else like no-ip duc or Utorrent etc...
